scripts.generate:help: cross-env-shell docker run --rm -v $INIT_CWD:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli config-help -g typescript-fetch
scripts.generate:run: cross-env-shell docker run --rm -v $INIT_CWD:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i /local/openapi.json -g typescript-fetch --template-dir  /local/templates -o /local/src/generated -c /local/openapi-config.yml
scripts.generate: npm run generate:run && npm run format:source && npm run format:tests
